cast.name: 海迪·阿姆布鲁斯特 Heidi Armbruster

writer.name: 特蕾莎·丽贝克 Theresa Rebeck

director.name: 特蕾莎·丽贝克 Theresa Rebeck

introduction: A weekend in the country spins out of control when jealous wife Maureen (Heidi Armbruster) makes a reckless accusation about her husband Ian (Alan Smyth) and their old friend Ella (Katie Kreisler). Ella's husband Peter (Brian Dykstra) tries and fails to stop the domestic carnage in this fierce and funny story about the unexpected ease of betrayal and the fragility of marriage.
